---
title: "AE 04: Gerrymandering + data exploration II"
categories: 
  - Application exercise

## Getting started

### Packages

We'll use the **tidyverse** package for this analysis.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(usdata)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```
:::


### Data

The data are availale in the **usdata** package.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(gerrymander)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

Columns: 12
```
